task.title: Configuring EMM and ESM cause code mapping enhancements
task.shortdesc: Use global parameter enableProvCc to enable feature Provisionable EMM and ESM cause code values (f10403-01), command emmCauseCodeMapping parameter intErrorCreateSessRespUserAuthFail to provision the EMM cause code values, command esmCauseCodeMapping parameter intErrorUserAuthenticationFailure to provision theESM cause code values, and command diamNasMappingProfile parameter noResponseFromHss to provision diameter cause code.

step.cmd: Enable provisionable EMM and ESM cause code values feature.
Provision the EMM cause code values.
Provision the ESM cause code values.
Check current EMM cause code values.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm emmCauseCodeMapping show 1 +--------------------------------------------+--------+ | Field | Value | +--------------------------------------------+--------+ | emmCauseCodeMapping | 1 | | emmCauseCodeMappingId* | 1 | | intErrorBearerSetupFailed | 19 | | intErrorServiceDenied | 19 | | intErrorIpv6OnlyAllowed | 19 | | intErrorIpv4OnlyAllowed | 19 | | intErrorNoApnAllowedByHss | 19 | | intErrorNoRespFromSgwAttPdn | 19 | | intErrorNoRespFromSgwTau | 10 | | intErrorIpVerMismatchAtt | 19 | | intErrorIpVerMismatchSvc | 17 | | intErrorIpVerMismatchTau | 17 | | intErrorOptIeInc | 19 | | intErrorSystemFailure | 19 | | intErrorMandIeInc | 19 | | intErrorSmcFailed | 3 | | intErrorCreateSessRespUserAuthFail | 17 | +--------------------------------------------+--------+
